sourceMeaningMnemonic: Try to <radical>say</radical> something to a <radical>lifeguard</radical> and you'll just end up getting a <kanji>lecture</kanji>.
meaningInfo: A lifeguard's favorite part of the job is telling people what to do, where to swim, when to get out of the water, and they love saying it in a bunch of words.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>lecture</kanji> loving lifeguard is none other than <ja><reading>こう</reading>いち</ja>! I mean, look how long winded the stuff on this site is? Can you imagine him trying to give you a talk about proper swimming etiquette?
readingInfo:
Close your eyes and picture <ja>こういち</ja> lecturing you. Ugh, it's the worst!

Hint: when you see the "lifeguard" radical, the reading is probably going to be <ja>こう</ja>.
